definition: elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao3 shuo1 Shi3 lu:e4

sentences.english: He is a student in YangMing Elementary School.
In this city, I have completed the country slightly to faculty's education.
sentences.chinese: 在這個城市，我完成了國小至專科的教育。

sentences.english: Tom:Fortunately this little dude is already attending elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 幸好我身邊的這個小子已經國小了。

sentences.english: I go to Ren-Ai Elementary school.
In America, even kindergartens and elementary schools have graduation ceremonies .
sentences.chinese: 在美國，甚至連幼稚園和國小都有畢業典禮。

sentences.english: Once a child enters primary school.
sentences.chinese: 通常一個小孩從上了國小後。

sentences.english: Cindy: Yes, this school is the 1st elementary school in Taichung County.
sentences.chinese: 是啊這個國小是臺中縣第一所小學。

sentences.english: The subjects include 577 teachers in certain public elementary schools in Taichung county.
sentences.chinese: 調查研究以臺中縣公立國小577位教師爲研究樣本。

sentences.english: San Guang Elementary and Police Station is at top right.
sentences.chinese: 右上方是三光國小跟派出所。
